price: Laiti mauti ndiyo yangeli kuwa ya kunimaliza kabisa.
footnotes: Laiti kuwa kule kufa niliko kwisha kufa kungeli kuwa ndio kumalizika kwangu kwa mwisho, wala nisingeli fufuliwa tena!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
